name: Purity Salt
description: Salt that has been blessed. By casting it over an area, abnormal spirit energy can be sensed and suppressed.
effect: Use on one engaged target. The target gains a +2 modifier to their Sense check.

name: Fire Sprite
description: A special pill that will burn brightly by consuming spirit energy. Even if it gets wet, it will still burn.
effect: For the rest of the scene, every target you choose in the combat zone ignores dim lighting penalties.

name: Potion
description: A spiritual drug refined from special herbs. It can be used to recover wounds by drinking it, or dousing the wound with it.

name: Greek Fire
description: A magical oil created with lost techniques.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: 4 Sq. / Target: 1#]. Targets who fail their Evasion check lose 5 HP at the end of every round. The target may spend one Prep Timing to clear this effect.

name: Black Seal
description: A unique card or strip of paper inscribed with a single verse from a grimoire.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: Strength Sq. / Target: Area]. Targets who fail their Evasion check take rank 1 magical damage. When attempting to dispel an Anomaly, one engaged target gains a +2 modifier to their Strength check.

name: White Seal
description: A unique card or strip of paper inscribed with a single verse from a holy book.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: Strength Sq. / Target: Area]. Targets who fail their Evasion check become blinded. When attempting to dispel an Anomaly, one engaged target gains a +2 modifier to their Agility check.

name: Red Seal
description: A unique card or strip of paper inscribed with a single verse of truespeak.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: Strength Sq. / Target: Area]. Targets who fail their Evasion check become staggered. When attempting to dispel an Anomaly, one engaged target gains a +2 modifier to their Intellect check.

name: Blue Seal
description: A unique card or strip of paper inscribed with a single verse from an unknown language.
effect: Use as a weapon attack with [Ranged Attack / Range: Strength Sq. / Target: Area]. Targets who fail their Evasion check become poison (refer to the Rating Chart). When attempting to dispel an Anomaly, one engaged target gains a +2 modifier to their Will check.

name: Elemental Augment Drug
description: A magic drug that strengthens elements, which works by being spread over a weapon.
effect: Use on one engaged target. For the rest of the combat, when one equipped weapon is bestowed with an element, the target gains +1 rank.

name: Rage Ether
description: A spiritual drug that renders one's body and mind invincible.
effect: Use it on yourself. For the rest of the combat, the you may remove one of the following conditions: staggered, pained, paralyzed, but you lose 5 HP at the end of every round. You may spend one Prep Timing to clear this effect.
